o if a pregnant woman is at increased risk for infection and requires immediate protection against polio,
IPV can be administered in accordance with the recommended schedules for adults
â€¢ HPV vaccines are not recommended for use in pregnant women.
o If a woman is found to be pregnant after initiating the vaccination series, the remainder of the 3- dose
series should be delayed until completion of pregnancy.
o Pregnancy testing is not needed before vaccination.
